description:
'Enjoy different music in various places around Kamura village with this BGM!

- "In Search of Hidden Springs" BGM
- "The Hunters' Secret Spring" BGM
- "The Palicoes of Yukumo Ranch" BGM
- "Spark of Blue: Original Version" BGM

After purchasing, speak to the Courier and select Add-on Content to receive the content. You will then be able to use it in the Room Customization section of the Housekeeper menu.
name: BGM "Yukumo Village"
